bibl.title: A Bilingual Archive from the Cynopolite Nome.
bibl.note: Greek and Demotic texts belonging to an archive of funerary priests (late Ptolemaic period), now in Leuven University and in the museum of Mallawi.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I

bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, A Bilingual Archive from the Cynopolite Nome.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 1, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 185-189.
Greek and Demotic texts belonging to an archive of funerary priests (late Ptolemaic period), now in Leuven University and in the museum of Mallawi.
